items.title: WebR ggplot2 Playground
items.desc: Interactive R data viz entirely in your browser - thanks to WebAssembly

items.title: Quesma Charts
items.desc: Turn CSV, Excel, or SQL data into clean, accurate, and professional visuals instantly. Like MidJourney for charts, but accurate. With six figures, not six fingers.

items.desc: A Vue-based visualization of quantum states and operations. With Klem Jankiewicz.

items.status: evolved into Virtual Lab by Quantum Flytrap

items.desc: D3.js hierarchy visualization of the Reddit 'NSFW ImageNet'

items.desc: Live training loss plot in Jupyter Notebook for Keras, PyTorch and other frameworks.

items.desc: Play with photons, superposition and entanglement. With true quantum mechanics underneath.
